DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effectiveness Graded Motor Imagery ( GMI ) hand functionality patient Distal Radius Fracture ( DRFx ) . This study carry 36 patient . These patient randomly assign two group : classic treatment group ( n=19 ) GMI group ( n=17 ) . Both group receive 8-week ( 2 day week ) physical therapy rehabilitation intervention . Outcome measurement base upper extremity functional status ( Disability Arm Shoulder Hand Michigan Hand Questionnaire score ) , pain ( rest activity Visual Analog Scale ) , range motion ( wrist flexion , extension , ulnar/radial deviation , supination pronation goniometer ) , grip strength ( standard grip strength Jamar hydraulic hand dynamometer ; lateral , palmar pinch strength pinch meter ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Graded Motor Imagery Improve Hand Function Patients With Distal Radius Fracture
